slides.title: What is a Fraction?
slides.body: A fraction a/b represents a parts out of b equal parts.

slides.title: Equivalent Fractions
slides.body: Multiply/divide numerator and denominator by same number.

slides.title: Simplifying
slides.body: Divide top and bottom by their GCD. Example: 8/12 → 2/3.

slides.title: Proportions
slides.body: Two ratios are equal: a/b = c/d. Cross-multiply: ad = bc.

questions.explain: Cross-multiply: 8x = 24 → x = 3. Wait, check: x/4 = 6/8 = 3/4 → x = 3.
